Attributes.description: Strengthening fluency and accuracy in spoken and written communication. Emphasis on mediation, interpretation, and metalinguistic competencies through translation and comparative stylistics. Aligned with CEFR level B2 objectives.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: SPAN 302. (or equivalent expertise in written and spoken Spanish.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Buchanan, Room: B303
